name: Dice Caster
description:
Cast elemental dice to sling spells against monsters invading the Chance-ellor’s castle! Strategically build your spell arsenal and unleash devastating spell salvos against all who challenge the king of chance!

Tutorial

  • Begin your defense with 5 spell dice that you cast each turn to inflict damage, heal, or impact the battlefield.
  • After your spells effects are resolved, you will be asked to select from 3 new dice to add for use next round.
  • Watch your health and that of the invader to stay alive and defend the Chance-ellor.

Controls

  • SPACE to cast your dice
  • Mouse to select die from the shop
  • ESCAPE to quit game
